00062         function generateModulePDF($records,$exportFields = array()) {
00063 
00064                 //init pdf object
00065                 $this->pdf = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Template_PDF");
00066                 $addedOneRecord = false;
00067 
00068                 //for all records,
00069                 //check if the record is valid.
00070                 //a valid record has at least one param to export
00071                 //if no valid record is found render an error message in pdf file
00072                 foreach($records as $data) {
00073                         $valid = false;
00074                         if(isset($data['params']) && is_array($data['params'])) {
00075                                 foreach($data['params'] as $key=>$value) {
00076                                         if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array($key,$exportFields)) {
00077                                                 $valid = true;
00078                                         }
00079                                 }
00080                         }
00081                         if($valid) {
00082                                 $addedOneRecord = true;
00083                                 $this->pdf->AliasNbPages();
00084                                 $this->pdf->AddPage();
00085                                 $this->pdf->SetFont('Arial','',12);
00086                                 $standardWidth = 100;
00087                                 $nameWidth = 70;
00088                                 $valueWidth = 70;
00089                                 $feedWidth = 30;
00090                                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("pid",$exportFields)) {
00091                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Page-ID:",0,0);
00092                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",$data['pid'],0,1);
00093                                 }
00094                                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("submission_date",$exportFields)) {
00095                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Submission date:",0,0);
00096                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",date("d.m.Y H:i:s",$data['crdate']),0,1);
00097                                 }
00098                                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("ip",$exportFields)) {
00099                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","IP address:",0,0);
00100                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",$data['ip'],0,1);
00101                                 }
00102                                         
00103                                 $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Submitted values:",0,1);
00104                                 $this->pdf->SetLineWidth(.3);
00105                                 $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00106                                 $this->pdf->SetFillColor(255,255,255);
00107                                 $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6","Name",'B',0,'C',true);
00108                                 $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6","Value",'B',0,'C',true);
00109                                 $this->pdf->Ln();
00110                                 $this->pdf->SetFillColor(200,200,200);
00111                                 $fill = false;
00112                                         
00113                                 foreach($data['params'] as $key=>$value) {
00114                                         if(is_array($value) && (count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array($key,$exportFields))) {
00115                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00116                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6",$key,0,0,'L',$fill);
00117                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",array_shift($value),0,0,'L',$fill);
00118                                                 $this->pdf->Ln();
00119                                                 foreach($value as $v) {
00120                                                         $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00121                                                         $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6","",0,0,'L',$fill);
00122                                                         $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",$v,0,0,'L',$fill);
00123                                                         $this->pdf->Ln();
00124                                                 }
00125                                                 $fill = !$fill;
00126                                         } elseif(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array($key,$exportFields)) {
00127                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00128                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6",$key,0,0,'L',$fill);
00129                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",$value,0,0,'L',$fill);
00130                                                 $this->pdf->Ln();
00131                                                 $fill = !$fill;
00132                                         }
00133                                                 
00134                                 }
00135                         }
00136                 }
00137 
00138                 //if no valid record was found, render an error message
00139                 if(!$addedOneRecord) {
00140                         $this->pdf->AliasNbPages();
00141                         $this->pdf->AddPage();
00142                         $this->pdf->SetFont('Arial','',12);
00143                         $this->pdf->Cell(300,100,"No valid records found! Try to select more fields to export!",0,0,'L');
00144                 }
00145                 $this->pdf->Output();
00146 
00147         }

00161         function generateFrontendPDF($gp,$langFile,$exportFields = array(),$file = "",$returns = false) {
00162                 $this->pdf = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Template_PDF");
00163                 $this->pdf->AliasNbPages();
00164                 $this->pdf->AddPage();
00165                 $this->pdf->SetFont('Arial','',12);
00166                 $standardWidth = 100;
00167                 $nameWidth = 70;
00168                 $valueWidth = 70;
00169                 $feedWidth = 30;
00170                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("pid",$exportFields)) {
00171                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Page-ID:",0,0);
00172                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,0,1);
00173                 }
00174                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("submission_date",$exportFields)) {
00175                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Submission date:",0,0);
00176                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",date("d.m.Y H:i:s",time()),0,1);
00177                 }
00178                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("ip",$exportFields)) {
00179                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","IP address:",0,0);
00180                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR'),0,1);
00181                 }
00182                 $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Submitted values:",0,1);
00183                 if(isset($gp) && is_array($gp)) {
00184                         $this->pdf->SetLineWidth(.3);
00185                         $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00186                         $this->pdf->SetFillColor(255,255,255);
00187                         $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6","Name",'B',0,'C',true);
00188                         $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6","Value",'B',0,'C',true);
00189                         $this->pdf->Ln();
00190                         $this->pdf->SetFillColor(200,200,200);
00191                         $fill = false;
00192                         unset($gp['renderMethod']);
00193                         foreach($gp as $key=>$value) {
00194                                 if(is_array($value) && (count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array($key,$exportFields))) {
00195                                         $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00196                                         $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6",trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$langFile.':'.$key)),0,0,'L',$fill);
00197                                         $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",array_shift($value),0,0,'L',$fill);
00198                                         $this->pdf->Ln();
00199                                         foreach($value as $v) {
00200                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00201                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6","",0,0,'L',$fill);
00202                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",$v,0,0,'L',$fill);
00203                                                 $this->pdf->Ln();
00204                                         }
00205                                         $fill = !$fill;
00206                                 } elseif(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array($key,$exportFields)) {
00207                                         $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00208                                         $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6",trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$langFile.':'.$key)),0,0,'L',$fill);
00209                                         $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",$value,0,0,'L',$fill);
00210                                         $this->pdf->Ln();
00211                                         $fill = !$fill;
00212                                 }
00213 
00214                         }
00215                 }
00216 
00217                 if(strlen($file) > 0) {
00218                         $this->pdf->Output($file, 'F');
00219                         $downloadpath = $file;
00220                         if($returns) {
00221                                 return $downloadpath;
00222                         }
00223                         header('Location: '.$downloadpath);
00224                 } else {
00225                         $this->pdf->Output();
00226                 }
00227 
00228         }

00231                 return;
